post.summary: Authorize using an API key to retrieve a JWT.
post.description: Authorize using an API key to retrieve a JWT.

get.summary: Retrieve a single association
get.description: Retrieve a single association by its UUID

get.summary: Find all usages of a specific association in a video
get.description: Fina all usages of a specific association in a video by it's link_name and video_reference_uuid

parameters.name: link_name
parameters.description: The link name portion of the associations to retrieve

get.summary: retrieves a single annotation
get.description: By passing in the observation UUID, you can retrieve a single annotation

post.description: Adds an annotation to the system. Note that at least one video index (timecode, elpased_time_millis, recorded_timestamp) is required.

get.summary: Retrieves all annotations for a given video
get.description: Using a given video-reference uuid, find all annotations for that video

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of items to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set

200.description: The video references to be returned

get.summary: Retrieves annotations by a contained image reference
get.description: Using a given image-reference uuid, find all annotations for that image

get.summary: Retrieve image information by its UUID
get.description: Retrieve an image reference by its UUID

put.summary: Modify/update image information by its UUID
put.description: Modify/update an image reference by its UUID

delete.summary: Delete an image reference by its UUID
delete.description: Delete an image reference by its UUID

post.description: Adds an image to the system. Note that at least one video index (timecode, elpased_time_millis, recorded_timestamp) is required.

get.summary: Retrieve image information by image reference UUID
get.description: Using a given image-reference uuid, find its metadata

get.summary: Return all images for a given video
get.description: Using a giving video-reference UUID, find all images for that video

get.summary: Return image information by image URL
get.description: Using the images URL, retrieve the metadata for the image

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL for the image. It should be url-encoded (i.e. escaped)

get.summary: Retrieve all imaged moments
get.description: find all imaged moments in the data store

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of items to return (default is 1000)

parameters.name: offset (default is 0)
parameters.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set

get.summary: Retrieve a single imaged moment by its UUID
get.description: Retreive a single imaged moment by its primary key

get.summary: Retrieve all imagedmoments that have been modified between dates
get.description: Find all imagedmoments that habe annotations that were created or modified between two dates

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of items to return (default is 1000)

parameters.name: offset (default is 0)
parameters.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set

get.summary: Retrieve a count of imagedmoments that have been modified between dates
get.description: Count all imagedmoments that habee annotations that were created or modified between two dates

get.summary: Retrieve a single observation by its UUID
get.description: Retreive a single observation by its primary key

delete.description: Delete a single observation by its UUID

put.description: Modify/Update a single observation by its primary key

get.summary: Retrieve all distinct activities used by any annotations
get.description: Retrieve all distinct activities used by any annotations

get.summary: Retrieve the number of usages of a concept
get.description: Retrieve a count of the number of usages of a concept in the entire data store

200.description: Count of observations using the given concept

put.summary: Rename all annotations using a given concept to a different one

get.summary: Retrieve all concepts used in annotations
get.description: Retrieve all concepts used in annotations

200.description: A list of ditinct concept names used in annotations

get.summary: Retrieve all concepts used in annotations for a video
get.description: Retrieve all concepts used in annotations

200.description: A list of ditinct concept names used in annotations

post.description: Delete one or more observations using their UUIDs in the post body (as json)

get.summary: Retrieve all distinct groups used by any annotations
get.description: Retrieve all distinct groups used by any annotations

get.summary: Retrive an observation by one of it's associations
get.description: Retrieve an observation by one its associations

get.summary: Return all observations for a given video
get.description: Using a giving video-reference UUID, find all observations for that video

get.summary: Return a count of observations for a given video
get.description: Using a giving video-reference UUID, find all observations for that video

200.description: Count of observations for a given video reference uuid

token_type.description: The type of the token. Normally it will be 'Bearer'

concept.description: The name of the object/annotation in the video

observer.description: The person who created or last modified the annotation

observation_timestamp.description: The date/time that the annotation was made

video_reference_uuid.description: The uuid of the video that this annotation belongs to

imaged_moment_uuid.description: The uuid for the imaged-moment for this video

timecode.description: Video timecode of the annotation (1 of 3 possible video indices)

elapsed_time_millis.description: Elapsed time from the start of the video for this annotation (1 of 3 possible video indices)

recorded_timestamp.description: The date that the frame of video containing the annotation was recorded (1 of 3 possible video indices)

duration_millis.description: The length of time (in milliseconds) that the concept in this annotation was observed

group.description: A logical grouping for this annotation. At MBARI we use platforms (ROV, AUV, etc) but this can be anything that is appropriate for your use case

activity.description: The activity that was occuring while the video was recorded. For example for our ROV's we use descend, ascend, transect. But, like group, use whatever is appropriate for your needs.

Association.description: Additional descriptive information associated with the annotation

mime_type.description: The mime-type of the data stored in link_value. Most common are 'plain/text' and 'application/json'

CachedAncillaryDatum.description: Ancillary data at this moment of video

crs.description: Co-ordinate reference system. Indicates how lat and lon ar calculated

x.description: camera coordinate system (x). Arbitrary!! Users choice

y.description: camera coordinate system (y). Arbitrary!! Users choice

z.description: camera coordinate system (z). Arbitrary!! Users choice

pose_position_units.description: The units of x, y, and z

phi.description: roll in radians, airplane coordinate system

theta.description: pitch in radians, airplne coordinate system

psi.description: tilt in radians, airplane coordinate system

video_reference_uuid.description: The uuid of the video that this image belongs to

platform_name.description: The name of the camera platform used to collect the video

mission_id.description: Id for the mission during which this video was collected

mission_contact.description: The contact name (e.g. chief scientist) for this mission

count.description: The number of usages of this concept found in the datastore

old_concept.description: The name of the concept before it was renamed

new_concept.description: The name of the concept after it was renamed

number_updated.description: The number of concepts renamed from 'old' to 'new'

description.description: A free-text description about the image.

video_reference_uuid.description: The uuid of the video that this image belongs to

imaged_moment_uuid.description: The uuid for the imaged-moment for this video

timecode.description: Video timecode of the annotation (1 of 3 possible video indices)

elapsed_time_millis.description: Elapsed time from the start of the video for this annotation (1 of 3 possible video indices)

recorded_timestamp.description: The date that the frame of video containing the annotation was recorded (1 of 3 possible video indices)

video_reference_uuid.description: The uuid of the video that this annotation belongs to

timecode.description: Video timecode of the annotation (1 of 3 possible video indices)

elapsed_time_millis.description: Elapsed time from the start of the video for this annotation (1 of 3 possible video indices)

recorded_timestamp.description: The date that the frame of video containing the annotation was recorded (1 of 3 possible video indices)

observations.description: The observations (i.e annotations) associated with this moment

imageReferences.description: The images associated with this moment

count.description: The number of modified imagedmoments/observations between the dates

observation_timestamp.description: The date/time the annotation was made

observer.description: The person who made the observation

group.description: A logical group that the observation belongs to

activity.description: Some logical grouping based on an action or activity that was occuring while the video was recorded

count.description: The number of annotations in a video
